attributes.additional_details:
Due to the extensive usage of the Kidwells Skate park in Maidenhead the RBWM are looking to create a user group to support, develop and improve the skate park.

There are many ideas that have been put forward to the team such as floodlighting, covering, and a smaller skate park for the younger users.

In order to achieve such goals funding is paramount as well as the users support.

So if you are passionate about Kidwells Skate park and want to be part of the future plans please sign this petition or contact matt.james@rbwm.gov.uk for further information.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
